meanings.definition: A person who pawns an item.
meanings.sent1: The pawners left their valuable watch at the pawn shop.
meanings.sent2: The pawn shop had many pawners coming in to get quick cash.
meanings.sent3: The pawners joked about starting a pawn shop for pets.
meanings.sent4: In the game, the players acted as pawners, trading items for gold.
meanings.sent5: The pawners in the story were known for their shrewd bargaining skills.

meanings.sent1: The pawners gathered to discuss their pawned items.
meanings.sent2: Many pawners visited the pawn shop to retrieve their belongings.
meanings.sent3: The pawners formed a club for people who frequently pawned things.
meanings.sent4: The pawners stood out in the crowd with their pawn shop receipts.
meanings.sent5: The pawners' collection of pawn tickets grew over time.
